description: Add an in-app local version badge for Researcher Mode and improve dictation mic permission denied UX (toast first, modal second).

changes.description: show local version badge in researcher mode

details.summary_simple: When Researcher Mode is enabled (including participant flow), show a small top-right badge with the current working version + local uncommitted patch counter sourced from `docs/verification-log.md`.

steps: Enable Researcher Mode and refresh any page.
Confirm the top-right badge shows v1.1.9-uncommitted6.

changes.description: toast first, modal second when mic permission denied for dictation

details.summary_simple: On the Feedback page, if the browser blocks microphone access, the first dictation attempt shows a destructive toast; repeated attempts open the existing mic-issue modal with permission guidance and a text fallback, then highlight/focus the relevant textarea on close.

steps: Block microphone permission for the site and go to /questionnaire/feedback.
Click Click to record once (toast only), then click again (modal opens).
Close the modal and confirm the relevant textarea is highlighted/focused.
